summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the City's annual arts festival known as "Bumbershoot"; establishing the Bumbershoot Festival Commission; specifying the duties and powers thereof; providing for the appointment and compensation of a Commission Coordinator; creating the Bumbershoot Festival Account; adding a new Chapter, Chapter 17.40, to the Seattle Municipal Code; repealing Ordinance 111143; revising the 1986 expenditure and revenue budget of the Seattle Center Operating Fund; and, appropriating expenditure authority for the 1986 budget of the Commission and increasing the General Fund's anticipated 1986 revenues.
